description: The VideoSecu articulating mount is a mounting solution for most 22"- 42" midsize flat panels and some models up to 55 inch. The TV mount fit VESA 200x200mm/200x100/100x100 (8"x8"/8"x4"/4"x4"). This wall mount comes with 4 removable mount adapters. It can extend the VESA to 400x400 400x300 400x200 300x300 300x200 (16"x16"/16"x12"/16"x8"/12"x12"/12"x8"). Please check your TV VESA; these are square or rectangular patterns between 4 and 16 inches per side on the rear of your display. Heavy gauge steel construction provides safety loading up to 88lbs display. The high-tech look mount offers 15 degrees up and down tilt, 180 degrees of swivel and extension up to 20 inch for viewing angle and TV placement adjustment. The removable VESA plate can be taken off for easy installation. Promotion: Please report to amazon.com if you receive a mount without VideoSecu logo. Note: 200 to 400 extensions included since January 2014.
title: VideoSecu LED LCD TV Wall Mount for most 22"-47" LCD, LED & Plasma Televisions and some models up to 55" inches - up to 88 lb VESA 400x400 mm with Full Motion Swivel Articulating Arm, 20 in Extension and Post-installation Leveling System, for Monitor Flat Panel Screen, Bonus 10 ft HDMI cable and Magnetic Bubble Leveler WP5
